narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Choctaw Nation of Oklahoma is a General Acute Care Hospital  Rural provider based in Talihina, OK. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $83.5M in Medicaid payments across 156K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $83.5M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
